resources.string: %1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
Google Play services requires an action
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
Error signing in the specified account. Please choose a different account.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
"Pebble's accessibility service is required to provide notification support for third-party Android applications."
Pebble cannot connect until bluetooth has been reset - please turn bluetooth off and then on again
Reset bluetooth to connect to Pebble
Customize your notification responses below. The canned messages will appear on your Pebble when notifications have a \"Reply\" action.
Connect a different Pebble by tapping below
Connect to a Pebble by tapping below
If you cancel connection, your Pebble will not be connected until you choose to connect
If you connect, the previous connection attempt will be cancelled
If you connect, the previous Pebble will be disconnected
If you disconnect, your Pebble will not be re-connected until you choose to connect
Please make sure you have disconnected the watch from your Original Pebble app, and try again
Connection failed: this application does not support your Pebble
Failed to send message to developer
Use imperial units (miles) for distance measurements.
You can now act on Gmail notifications!
You can now reply to Hangouts!
You can now act on Inbox notifications!
To get Gmail notifications on your watch, you need to connect Gmail notifications to Pebble.
To enable Gmail actions, install Android Wear.
To enable Hangouts replies, install Android Wear.
To enable Inbox actions, install Android Wear.
"It looks like you haven't enabled notifications yet, this means you won't receive notifications on your Pebble. Would you like to enable notifications now?"
"Couldn't load info about this app. Unable to install."
Already installing, please try again later.
Unable to connect to Google Fit
Your Pebble is now paired. Please wait while we update the software to the latest version.
No activity data yet. Wear your watch as you move and groove all day to see your fitness stats here.
%s uses the Pebble Health service. It will have access to the activity and sleep data collected from your Pebble smartwatch.
Enabling Insights for activity and sleep will provide a growing set of tools to help improve your daily routine. Pebble is with you every step of the way.
No sleep data yet. Start counting sheep with your watch on to get a better look at your sleep patterns.
Enter a value for inches between 0 and 11
Please describe the issue in detail. We will respond as quickly as possible. We will use a machine translation for non-English languages.
Would you like to send an anonymous report so we can fix the problem?
The update could not be downloaded. Would you like to try again?
Your device is not connected to the internet. Please resolve connectivity issues and try again.
%s has expired. Please check HockeyApp for any updates.
Would you like to send your feedback again?
"Message couldn't be posted. Please check your input values and your connection, then try again."
No response from server. Please check your connection, then try again.
"Message couldn't be posted. Please check the format of your email address."
"Please enter your HockeyApp account's email address and password to authorize access to this app."
Please fill in the missing account credentials.
Do you want to save your drawings?
In order to download and install app updates you will have to allow the app to access your device storage.
Show information about the new update?
%s is available and is a mandatory update!
Customize your incoming call responses below. The canned messages will appear on your Pebble when you want to reply to an incoming call.
Please download our new app on the Google Play store.
Setting this language on your watch will affect menu items and incoming notifications.
Hang tight! This might take a few minutes.
Error installing language. Please check your bluetooth and internet connection and try again.
Something went wrong. You can change the language later from the Settings menu.
"Set the language on your Pebble for menu items, incoming notifications and messages."
"Your Pebble is now updated with %s. You can change the selection at any time from the Settings menu."
Only one account is allowed to be used at a time!
Would you like to install the latest version?
Cannot connect to the Google Play Store
Cannot load bundle while Pebble is disconnected. Please connect your Pebble and try again.
Load this external app (%s) to your Pebble? This app will only be stored locally on this phone.
Load this external language pack (%s) to your Pebble? This language pack will not be stored by this application if you remove it from your Pebble.
Connect your Pebble to continue configuration.
More apps will appear as notifications are received.
There was a problem importing your apps
Check out \"%s\" on the Pebble Appstore!
Please install factory firmware before you can use your watch!
The bundle located at (%s) may contain malicious software, are you sure you want to install it?
You are not connected to Internet. Please connect to the Internet and try again.
"Hi there! This is what emails look like on your wrist. We hope you enjoy your Pebble! Best, The Pebble Team"
Try sending sample notifications to your Pebble
Texts on your watch? Welcome to the future!
"We're unable to send notifications to your Pebble at this time. Please, restart your phone to continue receiving notifications."
You can add new watchfaces and watchapps to your watch in our app store. Additional configuration can be done in My Pebble.
I want to be more active
Unable to connect to Google Fit
"Welcome to Pebble Health! Here we'll track your sleep and activity so you can become a better you."
By clicking \"Agree\", you confirm that you have read the updated Pebble Privacy Policy, that you understand it and that you agree to be bound by it.
Our Privacy Policy governs your use of this feature. By clicking "Enable" you confirm that you want to enable this feature.
Insights give you suggestions on how to live a healthier life and syncs with your timeline to determine when you have time in your day.
To get notifications on your watch, you need to enable Pebble in system settings by tapping the button below.
Notifications are an integral part of Pebble. To turn them on, go to: Settings>Notifications>Notification Access
The firmware is not compatible with the current watch.
Install could not start. Please try again.
"No pebble is connected. Connect and try again."
Could not find any firmware to install.
"Firmware install timed out. Please try again."
Please tell us a bit about yourself.
Pebble monitors your heart rate all day and night so you can work out smarter, check out your stats, and learn more about yourself.
For the best results, wear your Pebble snug but comfortable and about two fingers’ width above your wrist bone.
Something went wrong, please try again.
"This app is currently English only. Don't worry, your watch still supports English, French, Spanish, and German"
"You're all set to run the new Pebble OS equipped with timeline and a bunch of other awesome Pebble features."
Could not find any migration firmware to install.
Your Pebble is in classic mode and needs an update.
Your Pebble is in factory mode and needs an update.
"Your Bluetooth name is displayed on the screen. Existing users can find it from the watch's center button menu under \"Settings - Bluetooth\"."
Press the \"RETRY PAIRING\" button below and then press the \"Up Button\" on your Pebble when prompted.
Now your Pebble is up to date.
"Simultaneously hold down the \"Back\", \"Up\" and \"Select\" buttons for approximately 30 seconds. Once you see the Pebble logo, you may release the buttons."
Updating your Pebble to the latest software…
This indicates the color of a Pebble.
Please triple check that your Pebble is charging during this update! if not, your watch could get damaged
"To reduce carrier data charges, don't update apps over mobile networks"
Customize the canned messages available on your Pebble
Check this box to stop using built-in SMS notifications. Use this only if having issues with missing SMS notifications
Show Developer Connection in the main menu
Removes the persistent Pebble notification when idle
Customize the canned messages available on your Pebble

Installing the Android Wear app on your device will enable richer notification actions on your Pebble. You do not need to open the Android Wear app at all - just having it installed will improve notifications to your Pebble
Additional information to help you properly setup actionable notifications.
"Send notifications when phone's screen is on"
Enables a sneak peek of the Reminders App! Currently this feature is only compatible with English.
Please update your firmware to the latest version for this setting to take effect
Voice dictation requires usage logging to be enabled. Are you sure you want to disable usage logs?
Disabling usage logs will also disable voice dictation
Skipping firmware update check: updates disabled
Customize your canned messages below to begin a conversation from your Pebble.
Send texts from your Pebble to your favorite contacts.
You can add up to %d contacts in the list.
Something went wrong, please try again later.
Blog, news, feed, forums and more.

" Please use this form to contact us if you currently have a Pebble and you are having difficulties. For all other queries, questions and issues, please check help.getpebble.com.
Describe the problem you are experiencing:
%1$s
===========================
Attached below are log files to help our engineers analyze the problem.
Please do not modify them.
"
"Pebble currently provides email support in English but we'll do our best to provide a machine translation in our response."
You can find all major help responses here.
Learn more about what your Pebble can do.
An app or feature. We want to hear from you!
Send test notifications to your Pebble.
"Let's make sure your Pebble is fully up to date"
Making sure your Pebble is up to date
Something went wrong. Please try again.
It seems you have location settings set to \"Device only\" mode. To add your current location, please enable a higher level of location accuracy.
"Location data unavailable! Tap here to fix the issue."
Location permission required. Please fix this issue in Android system settings.
"No locations selected! Click here to add locations."
Android Google+ like floating action button which reacts on the list view scrolling events. Becomes visible when the list view is scrolled up and invisible when scrolled down.
